title: Spirituality for Kids Family Class

Spirituality for Kids ?Family Class starts Tuesday November 17th for 12 weeks (no classes between Christmas and New Year?s) 5pm to 6:30 pm. $150 per child, $100 per additional sibling. All materials included; parents attend free.? Spirituality For Kids teaches children spiritual principles at an early age so it can positively impact their character and empower them in their teen years, and even into adulthood.? You can register in the Los Angeles Kabbalah bookstore or email arlene.santos@sfk.org.? For more information about the program, visit www.spiritualityforkids.com.
